subject: RE: [junit] JUnit in Action book
msgSnippet: Vincent, I must be missing the obvious, cause I couldn t get to the MEAP from the link you provided, or even from the home page of manning. Could you help me
messageBody:
Vincent,
I must be missing the obvious, cause I couldn't get to the MEAP
from the link you provided, or even from the home page of manning.
Could you help me out?
Thanks,
Nilesh
